General.Name: PCAS SA
General.Description: PCAS SA develops and produces complex molecules for life sciences and technologies. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Longjumeau, France. PCAS SA is a subsidiary of Seqens SAS
General.Address: 21, chemin de la sauvegarde, Longjumeau, France, 69134
